name: Carnage: Business of Vengeance
description:
This is a game made for Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme of "Roots".

You play as a reversed detective, in bringing chaos into the world by fulfilling the client's request for vengeance. It's a randomized puzzle game with a dash of roguelikes. 

How to play:
1. Collect the required items around the map then return to where you started. 
2. Police will appear and block your route if you choose to risk yourself in "choosing" a drop.
